item.title: Hemans Tug Tug Tug o War
item.dc:creator: @KyleGut3 KyleGut3
item.description:
@KyleGut3 wrote:

Yeah dude, elfonso, who the fuck are you to criticize his script in any way? All I’ve seen from you is a VERY detectable autotalker for runescpae, and what appears to be a completely coordinate based refresher script.

heman, it is very good that you are starting to script, dont listen to inexperienced jackasses like elfonso.

As a suggestion, download the Scar Tutorail.exe, it is VERY helpful and I suggest you read it through at least once… hell I still have to reference it from time and time again. If you can’t figure out how to do something, feel free to message me over aim or any other medium, I keep those public for anyone in need.

Good Luck!

Read full topic

item.description:
@elfonso wrote:

Extremly low grade script, could be done in less then three seconds. It acutally requires alow of hard work to win, and you cant win very easily, bye the third or fourth round, you lose to quickly to enter the keys.

item.description:
@KyleGut3 wrote:

Sorry heman, my last post wasn’t meant to be rude. This is a fine start @ making scripts, though I would suggest trying to make your script more complicated. i.e. Find a way to auto-hit the QWE buttons. [something im far too lazy to do] ;D. Good start!

item.title: Hemans Tug Tug Tug o War
item.dc:creator: @hemanthecowfromsythe hemanthecowfromsythe
item.description:
@hemanthecowfromsythe wrote:

Hi, this is my first script, and yes it works.

[code]///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
///////////////////Hemansthecow’s Tug Tug Away Script//////////////////
///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
//////This is a working script. Anyhow, any bugs, email me at /////////
//////////////////inuyasha11121@aol.com////////////////////////////////
///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
//////////////////Hot to Use://////////////////////////////////////////
/////Start up Tug O War, drag the crosshair to it. Start the game,/////
/////Quickley find the keys you need to press at the top, and set//////
/////them in the bottom, hit play./////////////////////////////////////
///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
//Note//
//You MAY NOT take this script and say it is your, or post it without//
//my permission!//Use this Script at your own risk, I am not responsible
//to whatever happens. This script is for educational reasons.//
program Hemanstugowar; //
Const
Key1= (‘y’);
Key2= (‘b’); //

begin //
wait(50);
writeLn(’///////////////////////////////////’)
WriteLn(’//Thank you for using my script ///’)
WriteLn(’////////HemantheCow///of Sythe. ///’)
WriteLn(’//The script will start in…///’)
WriteLn(’// Two Seconds, please Click on ///’)
WriteLn(’///////Tug-O-War///////////////////’)
WriteLn(’//Using Version 1//////////////////’)
WriteLn(’///////////////////////////////////’)
Wait(1000)
repeat
KeyDown(GetKeyCode(key1));
Sleep(45);
KeyUp(GetKeyCode(key1));
Sleep(45);
KeyDown(GetKeyCode(key2));
Sleep(45);
KeyUp(GetKeyCode(key2));
Sleep(45)
until(False);
end.[/code]
